title: Home Town Story 1951 (Marilyn Monroe, Jeffrey Lynn) Romance, Comedy | Full Movie

sources.title: Home Town Story 1951 (Marilyn Monroe, Jeffrey Lynn) Romance, Comedy | Full Movie
sources.description:
After failing to be re-elected, politician Blake Washburn returns home and becomes editor of the local newspaper. When he notices the influence the paper has on the public, he uses it to appeal to potential voters in the next election.

Original title: Home Town Story (1951)

Colorized version:  https://youtu.be/D3cVEb4rPkQ


This film is available with multiple subtitle options.
Director & Write: Arthur Pierson
Stars: Jeffrey Lynn, Donald Crisp, Marjorie Reynolds, Alan Hale Jr. & Marilyn Monroe
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance
